about.bio: I'm an AI engineer passionate about building technology that creates meaningful impact. Currently pursuing my degree at the Faculty of Sciences of Sfax.
about.background: Through international volunteering across Turkey, Morocco, and Tunisia, I’ve gained a deep appreciation for global challenges and the role technology can play in solving them. While I don’t have all the answers about climate or conservation, I know the environment makes me feel more alive. I’m still discovering how I can help protect it — even in small ways — because a healthier planet means healthier people, and I care deeply about both
about.education: Computer Science & Communications, Faculty of Sciences of Sfax
about.personalNote: When I'm not studying, you'll find me exploring new cultures through AIESEC volunteering, learning new languages, or planning my next international adventure. I'm driven by the belief that technology should serve humanity, not the other way around.
